title: TikTok Ads for Shopify Brands: Getting Started Without Wasting Budget
excerpt: TikTok offers massive reach for e-commerce brands, but the creative rules are completely different. Learn how to launch your first TikTok campaign without burning through your budget.
author: alex-thompson

content.text: TikTok has emerged as a powerful advertising platform for e-commerce, with over 1 billion monthly active users and an audience that's increasingly ready to buy. But the platform demands a fundamentally different creative approach than Meta or Google.

The golden rule of TikTok advertising: make TikToks, not ads. Content that looks like a native TikTok video outperforms polished brand ads by 3-5x. Use trending sounds, UGC-style filming, and authentic storytelling.

Start with a Conversion campaign objective, not Traffic or Video Views. Use broad targeting initially and let TikTok's algorithm find your audience. Set a daily budget of at least $50 per ad group to give the algorithm enough data to optimize.

TikTok's attribution is even more challenging than Meta's. The platform tends to over-report conversions significantly. Use UTM tracking and verify with actual Shopify order data through metricx to understand your true TikTok ROAS.
